meanings.definition: A slang term for an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my bumbershoot in my bag in case it rains.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to grab your bumbershoot before you leave the house.
meanings.sent3: When the wind turned my bumbershoot inside out, I looked like Mary Poppins!
meanings.sent4: Her colorful bumbershoot stood out in the sea of black umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The bumbershoot shielded me from the sun's harsh rays.

meanings.definition: To carry or use an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: I bumbershooted my way through the storm to stay dry.
meanings.sent2: She always bumbershoots when it starts to drizzle.
meanings.sent3: He bumbershooted so gracefully, it was like a dance in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The way she bumbershooted through the crowd was like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: Bumbershooting in the rain made the city streets glisten.
